Class PlatformConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.ddlutils.task.PlatformConfiguration

public class PlatformConfiguration
extends Object

Encloses the platform configuration for the Ant tasks.

public boolean isSortForeignKeys()
Determines whether a table's foreign keys read from a live database shall be sorted alphabetically. Is false by default.

Returns:
